Plot: Returning to Woodmere after Becca’s high school graduation in California, Autumn discovers restoring friendships is more difficult than making them. In the small Minnesota town of Woodmere, where knowing everything is everyone’s business, a surprisingly small amount of truth is actually known. When the past becomes the present, more than one life is in danger. Will Autumn gain Craig and Kenzie’s trust in time, or will she be Taken in the Woods?
